comment: One of the best professors at KSU! His tests are hard but he cares about you actually understanding the material so he allows test corrections if you complete all the homework. If science isn't your best subject, TAKE HIM! He will keep your interest during lecture and labs actually fly by.
Test are HARD! BUT Allows Test corrections if you do the homework! Very Helpful! You know exactly what to expect. WONDERFUL TEACHER!

BEST PROFESSOR I've taken at KSU! He knows the material, and will answer any questions you have. Actually made labs enjoyable and worth your time. Told us from day 1 tests were difficult, allows test corrections if you complete hw problems. Can exempt the final! Makes himself available for any help you need or questions you have. TAKE HIM!! :)
His tests are HARD, but you are able to make test corrections to increase your grade.
Dr Rosengrant is one of the best professors at KSU.  I would definitely suggest him if you are not a science person.  He makes it all make sense!

Dr. Rosengrant is AWESOME!  He is not the EASIEST, but he makes the class interesting and wants you to get a good grade.  His test are hard but they are a small part of your grade.  Take this professor!! He is one of a kind!

Fantastic professor! I have never learned so much from a science class. His labs are useful and he tries to make lectures interesting with a youtube video or a funny joke. My favorite thing was he allows test corrections and drops lowest lab and quiz grades. TAKE HIM!

I'm not a Science person, but he made it fun & easy to understand! He is always willing to help/work with you until you learn the material.  You have quizzes in lab & lecture, but he drops the lowest grades. Also, 3 exams in class with an optional final. I would recommend taking his class!!. A LOT of the material in his class showed up on the GACE!

I had to work very hard but received an A in this class.  Professor makes himself available to meet with you if things are unclear & I STRONGLY recommend that you meet with him before test if you don't understand something.  Material & test are hard. You have lab and lecture quizzes every week.  Overall GREAT Teacher would highly recommend.
This is THE BEST teacher I have ever had. I almost changed my major to science ECUC after taking him. He is EXTREMELY helpful and makes concepts fun to learn. It is a lot of work- but worth it.

A absolutely amazing professor. The content is hard, but he makes it very interesting and easy to understand. Very helpful and always available to help if you need it. Exams are hard, but if you go to every lab and take the weekly lecture quizzes and do test corrections you will get an A!

Wonderful teacher! He is extremely helful during both class and in the labs. We had a quiz every other class but he went over the material covered just before. The tests can be hard but he gives a study guide and allows you to ask for any help. He gives alot of great tips for science in the class I would highly recommend him to any future teacher.

Awesome professor!!!!! He is by far the best teacher I have had in my entire life!!! I never liked science or anything that had math in it and he really made me want to teach science! He is really helpful too. He also gives test corrections! Awesome professor! You should definitely take him!!

Wonderful professor!  Extremely nice guy.  There is a lot of material to cover, but he makes class interesting.  The tests are challanging, but nothing on them that was not gone over in class.  Quizes every class, but he reviews the previous day before the quiz.  I learned a lot not only the content, but also about teaching. I would take him again!

Makes subject way more difficult than it has to be. Condescending attitude. Yells. This class did not need to be so complex. Tests and quizzes at every class session.  So much work that class should have been worth 5 credits instead of 3.  Wait for another prof to teach this class if you can.  he's the only one teaching it right now.

Dr. Rosengrant is very helpful, the info is not easy, but he gives funny examples and makes the class interesting. I would recommend taking him, he gives quizzes and labs that boost your grade. If you're going to spend 5 hours a week with a professor Dr. Rosengrant is a good choice. The final is optional and grading is very prompt. Very helpful

LOVE HIM!! Would absolutley recommend him!  The information is difficult, but he really takes the time to make it as clear as possible.  You have to study for his tests...ALOT...but he has a lot of grades that will help even everything out.  I've never really enjoyed science, but I really enjoyed this class!

The content is difficult, but the prof is fantastic. He really makes an effort to make the classes enjoyable and interesting. The labs were rough, way long with a LOT of content to cover, but, as stated before, this is controlled by the department, not Dr. Rosengrant. He is a VERY prompt grader, gives partial credit, and very much available for q's

The content for the class can be difficult, but the instructor tries his best to make it interesting and easy to understand.  He is always available for questions and comments.  His tests are mult. choice and short answer with partial points available.  The only downfall is the lenth of the labs, but the dept. designs them.
GREAT TEACHER!
It is very clear that he is knowledgeable on his subject and enjoys teaching it! He is very helpful if you need help. Hard tests, so study. I would take him again.
Great professor!  Kind and helpful.  Very easy to understand and if you don't understand, he will help you in class, after class or during office hours.  I highly recommend taking his class.
